title: Get list of active symbols Receive
description: A message list of active symbols

active_symbols.title: Active symbols
active_symbols.description: List of active symbols. Note: if the user is authenticated, then only symbols allowed under his account will be returned.

symbol.description: Binary.com symbol code for this underlying

exchange_is_open.description: 1 or 0 - whether the market is currently open or closed

exchange_name.description: Exchange name (for underlyings listed on a Stock Exchange)

delay_amount.description: Amount the feed is delayed (in minutes) due to Exchange licensing requirements

is_trading_suspended.description: 1 indicates that trading is currently suspended

quoted_currency_symbol.description: For stocks and stock indices, the underlying currency for that instrument

spot_age.description: Number of seconds elapsed since the last spot price

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
